newsitem.title: GERMANY: SOCCER-STRUGGLING ST PAULI SACK COACH MASLO.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-STRUGGLING ST PAULI SACK COACH MASLO.

text.p: Hamburg side St Pauli, facing relegation from the German Bundesliga, sacked coach Uli Maslo on Monday and appointed assistant Klaus-Peter Nemet as his replacement until the end of the season.
Maslo led the club into the Bundesliga in 1995 after less than a year in charge but recent performances have been disappointing and the team are now languishing one from bottom.
The final straw for the St Pauli board was a dismal 4-0 defeat away to bottom side Freiburg on Saturday.
Angry fans staged a sit-down protest in front of the team bus after the match and only moved after Maslo and several players came out to apologise for their performance.
